function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Low capacity of countries at greatest risk to handle and minimize the risk of a pandemic","Impact":"Increased probability of widespread pandemic outbreaks","Mitigation":"Investment in healthcare systems and international cooperation for preparedness","Technologies":"Healthcare infrastructure and communication technologies","People":"Populations in countries with limited capacity","Owner":"International health organizations and governments"},{"Description":"Scarcity of medical equipment and medication","Impact":"Compromised healthcare delivery and increased mortality rate","Mitigation":"Increased manufacturing capacity and efficient distribution systems","Technologies":"Manufacturing technology and supply chain management","People":"Healthcare providers and patients","Owner":"Healthcare organizations and governments"},{"Description":"Economic recession and social impact","Impact":"Increased mental stress, demographic alterations, and unpredictable fiscal recession","Mitigation":"Economic stimulus packages and social support programs","Technologies":"Economic modeling and social welfare systems","People":"General population and vulnerable demographics","Owner":"Government and social welfare organizations"}]}
